title: Schrödinger's Role

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: You may make a guess on people being either dead or alive

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: As long as you're alive, nobody knows who is dead or alive, until you make your guess at the end of the day. Everyone may vote privately, but nobody may talk.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make 3 accurate predictions, at which point everyone may talk and gameplay continues as normal as if you were not ingame.

desc:
Post 1332
*"Until I unlock the doors for communication, Nobody will know who is dead, and who is alive."*
